title: How to Make Inexpensive Wine Bottle Centerpieces

steps.headline: Get your empty wine bottles.
steps.description: Make sure you clean them for this project. Wash bottles using dish washing soap and dry with towel.

steps.headline: Use 1000 grit sandpaper to smoothen the bottle's surface.
Get your spray paint, you can use any color you desire, but black looks simple and elegant.
Prepare the paint area, making sure it's well ventilated.
Adding some accessories gives more accent on the color.
You can now have this displayed as your centerpiece.

text: Get your empty wine bottles. Make sure you clean them for this project. Wash bottles using dish washing soap and dry with towel. Use 1000 grit sandpaper to smoothen the bottle's surface.  Get your spray paint, you can use any color you desire, but black looks simple and elegant.  Prepare the paint area, making sure it's well ventilated.  Start spraying.  Make another paint coating.  Allow to dry completely.  Accessorize if you like.  Get your glue gun.  Adding some accessories gives more accent on the color.  You can now have this displayed as your centerpiece.
